WRITING.TITLE: Dedicated Stylus For iPhone???
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, I just wanted to ask what people would think about an iPhone having a dedicated stylus like the Samsung Note line. I use both the the 11 Pro Max and the Note 20 Ultra and while I really like the iPhone I #8217;ve always wondered why they wouldn #8217;t or haven #8217;t added their own version of a stylus yet. I don #8217;t always use the s pen in my Note 20 but when I do it can be pretty useful, especially for writing, drawing and filling out documents. It also has some other uses such as being used as a controller for the camera or to be used to preform gestures. I #8217;ve been thinking about it for awhile now and I really think that it could appeal to a large amount of iPhone users, while not only would it make work related documents and etc. easier to work with. It could also just be used for drawing/art and could just overall be a handy tool built into an iPhone. Anyways I was just wondering about other #8217;s thoughts on this subject and if people would like to see something like this happen.
